tool.name: cooler_zoomify
tool.description: Copy and balance a cool file.

param.name: input
param.label: Select the input cool file to zoomify.
Number of pixels dedicated to each process
Resultion
param.help: Comma-separated list of target resolutions. Use suffixes B or N to specify a progression: B for binary (geometric steps of factor 2), N for nice (geometric steps of factor 10 interleaved with steps of 2 and 5). Examples: 1000B=1000,2000,4000,8000,... 1000N=1000,2000,5000,10000,... 5000N=5000,10000,25000,50000,... 4DN is an alias for 1000,2000,5000N

tool.help:
**cooler zoomify** tool developped by mirnylab see https://github.com/mirnylab/cooler and https://cooler.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cli.html#cooler-balance
command-line::
cooler zoomify -p \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -c $chunksize -r '$resolution'
